# propertyList(forType:)

**Instance Method**

Returns the value for the specified type as a property list.

## Declaration

```swift
func propertyList(forType type: NSPasteboard.PasteboardType) -> Any?
```

## Parameters

- **type**: A uniform type identifier string.

## Return Value

The value for the specified type as a property list.

## Getting values

- **data(forType:)**: Returns the value for the specified type as a data object.
- **string(forType:)**: Returns the value for the specified type as a string.

items.description: Returns the value for the specified type as a data object.
items.name: data(forType:)

items.description: Returns the value for the specified type as a string.
items.name: string(forType:)
